about_the_game:
The game story is set in a country with an authoritarian government, where the people are oppressed. As a general of the country, in order to save the people, you chose an uprising, started arming yourself, formed a team, and liberated one city after another.
The game scenes are divided into military camp scenes and combat scenes. In military camp scenarios, players can use the acquired skill points to add points to their skills, purchase weapons and armor, equip themselves, enhance their combat effectiveness, and also recruit soldiers to expand their legion. In combat scenarios, players can use firearms to kill enemies or have soldiers charge into battle to help themselves achieve victory.
Game Features
A more realistic simulation of firearms requires players to manually load the ammunition into the magazine and load it before firing.
A variety of firearms are available to choose from, including pistols, submachine guns, assault rifles, snipers, and light machine guns.
